channel.title: Nfl on Stencilled

item.title: NFL Season 2016-17
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description:
Hello World !!! This is my first project using d3js. Being a GIS professional, visualization is always a part of job. I always wanted to learn different ways for visualizing data.Let it be a simple plot using R or a choropleth map using Arcmap .
In this project I am trying to display how the NFL season 2016-17 went about. Ofcourse was surprised to see the Cowboys doing so well. May be we got our own Tom Brady.I started working with the data grabbed from the NFL site for how the season went by each seasson. Below is the location for the each team.
